# SampleConfs - Advanced Systems

Config files for advanced game mechanics and special systems.

## Cultivation & Immortality
- **ImmortalHuman.json** - Human immortal path
- **ImmortalMethod.json** - Immortal methods
- **ImmortalMethodBase1.json** - Base method system
- **ImmortalMethodSet.json** - Method sets
- **ImmortalPoint.json** - Immortal points
- **ImmortalPosition.json** - Immortal positions
- **ImmortalSlot.json** - Immortal slots
- **ImmortalStore.json** - Immortal store
- **ImmortalUISetting.json** - UI settings
- **PassiveMethod.json** - Passive cultivation
- **PassiveMethodType31.json** - Specific passive type
- **TaoistHeart.json** - Taoist heart system
- **TaoistHeartEffect.json** - Heart effects
- **TaoistSeed.json** - Cultivation seeds

## Crafting & Alchemy
- **MakePillFormula.json** - Pill recipes
- **MakePillFurnace.json** - Alchemy furnaces
- **MakePillSkill.json** - Alchemy skills
- **RuneFormula.json** - Rune crafting
- **RuneParameters.json** - Rune parameters
- **RuneWriting.json** - Rune inscription

## Geomancy & Fortune
- **FortuitousEvent.json** - Fortune events
- **FortuitousParameters.json** - Fortune parameters
- **GeomancyEvent.json** - Geomancy events
- **GeomancyGame.json** - Geomancy games
- **GeomancyQuantity.json** - Quantities
- **GeomancyResult.json** - Results
- **GeomancySkill.json** - Geomancy skills
- **GeomancyTalent.json** - Talents
- **DrawLotResult.json** - Fortune telling

## Special Weapons
### Soul Devour Sword
- **SoulDevourSwordDevour.json** - Devouring system
- **SoulDevourSwordEffects.json** - Sword effects
- **SoulDevourSwordLevel.json** - Sword levels
- **SoulDevourSwordParamer.json** - Parameters

### Lotus Sword
- **lotusSwordEffects.json** - Lotus effects
- **lotusSwordParamer.json** - Parameters
- **lotusSwordSeedGrow.json** - Growth system

## Buildings & Structures
- **BuildingBook.json** - Book building
- **BuildingHospital.json** - Hospital building
- **BuildingMeditation.json** - Meditation room
- **BuildingStorageImmortal.json** - Immortal storage

## Pets & Companions

### Potmon System
- **PotmonBase.json** - Base pet system
- **PotmonBattle.json** - Pet combat
- **PotmonBattleExp.json** - Battle experience
- **PotmonBattleSkill.json** - Battle skills
- **PotmonConverPropertyScale.json** - Property conversion
- **PotmonFurryAction.json** - Furry actions
- **PotmonFurryGradeLevel.json** - Furry grades
- **PotmonGradeLevel.json** - Pet grades
- **PotmonLogFunction.json** - Logging
- **PotmonMap.json** - Pet locations
- **PotmonParamer.json** - Parameters
- **PotmonPropertyScale.json** - Property scaling
- **PotmonRomanTarget.json** - Romance targets
- **PotmonSkill.json** - Pet skills
- **PotmonSkillAid.json** - Aid skills
- **PotmonSkillFixOutput.json** - Fixed output
- **PotmonSkillLife.json** - Life skills
- **PotmonSkillStudy.json** - Learning skills
- **PotmonUnitAction.json** - Unit actions
- **PotmonUnitFeedBack.json** - Feedback system

### Fairy Chicken
- **FairyChickenBase.json** - Base system
- **FairyChickenDress.json** - Appearance
- **FairyChickenRestraint.json** - Restraints
- **FairyChickenSkillBase.json** - Skills
- **FairyChickenStore.json** - Store
- **FairyChickenSystemBase.json** - System base

### Wingman
- **WingmanBase.json** - Base wingman
- **WingmanEffect.json** - Effects
- **WingmanFixValue.json** - Fixed values

- **FairyLeagueParameters.json** - League parameters
